name: Achievement Idler: Black
description: Achievement Idler: Black is an Achievement spam "game" that you start up to idle in the background and get the achievements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 or radeon equivalent Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 or radeon equivalent Storage: 10 MB available space
